sentence.Network_en: The period from the War of Independence to the Civil War is the babyhood of the United States.
sentence.Network_cn: 从独立战争到内战这个时期是美国的婴儿期.

sentence.Network_en: Within myself, I had sustained , from my babyhood, a perpetual conflict with injustice.
sentence.Network_cn: 拿我来说, 我从孩提时代起就受虐待, 我的心里也始终在反抗.

sentence.Network_en: Thirty - four years ago, her son wore the necklace for good health and safety during his babyhood.
sentence.Network_cn: 三十四年前, 她为了幼年儿子健康平安给他戴上了这条项链.

reading aloud is also an important way to help your child make the transition from babyhood to toddlerhood .朗读也是能帮助孩子的一个重要的方式，帮助他们从婴儿期过渡到幼儿期。

entry.def: Your babyhood is the period of your life when you were a baby.

means.word_mean: 1. the early stage of growth or development

auth_sentence.content: The journey towards becoming an independent adult starts in babyhood, with your child wanting to try things for himself.
auth_sentence.res_content: The journey towards becoming an independent adult starts in babyhood, with your child wanting to try things for himself.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The journey towards becoming an independent adult starts in babyhood, with your child wanting to try things for himself.

auth_sentence.content: Her only memory of England from her babyhood was "the smell of damp autumn leaves".
auth_sentence.res_content: Her only memory of England from her babyhood was "the smell of damp autumn leaves".
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Her only memory of England from her babyhood was "the smell of damp autumn leaves".

auth_sentence.content: Beginning in babyhood, play is inexorably linked to learning, socialization, development and even intellect.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Beginning in babyhood, play is inexorably linked to learning, socialization, development and even intellect.
